item.description:
I REALLY need a live band this weekend.  Hope you'll join me for some good ole fashion rock 'n rol sounds with the awesome "Wildfire" band.

Here's TP's website http://www.tpsscoreboard.com/index.php?link=entertainments

they have great food, atmosphere and if you'd like to come for dinner, I'll be there between 7-730, and we'll rock on about 9pm.  This band actually (usually) starts on time!  And TP's does separate checks, no questions asked.  I just love this venue and this band.

Casual or dress to impress.

I live in Pelham, for any carpoolers, takes me about 1/2 hour to get there, and I go through Dracut, so if you want a ride...hit me up :)

Hope to see you on the dance floor!

suz
item.how_to_find_us: meetup sign on the table, area near dance floor in the back

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: anyone want to join me in Woburn for a live band? WILDFIRE will light YOUR fire
